app.name: Korbo's Wii Donut Mod'
app.short_description: A spinning donut for your Wii!
app.long_description:
Wii Donut, a spinning donut for your Wii! All the hard work was done by Andy Sloane (coding) and Jogeir Liljedahl (the sweet music), I just threw it on a Wii. Modified by Korbo.
e-mail: jornmann: jornmann@duck.com Andy Sloane: andy@a1k0n.net Korbo: korbo@ooer.ooo
The background song is "Addiction" by Jogeir Liljedahl.
